overview: What would you do if sex got in the way of everything...Work...Life...Love? Could you stop? Could you go 40 days without it? Watch as Kyle tries to get over ex-girlfriend Kari and tries to find love with his one and only soulmate Haley in this romantic comedy where your vow is the only thing you can trust!
tagline: Alektra Blue is counting down the days
title: The Vow
